oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Model analysis of environmental relations in a vegetable rotation experiment
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thorup-Kristensen, Kristian
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
Farm nutrient management
Composting and manuring
Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In a chapter which will be part of the final report from the Subproject 7 of the QLIF project (http://www.qlif.org/), the nitrogen relations of organic and conventional vegetable rotations are analysed using the EU-rotate simulation model. Measured data from the VegQure project are used, where a vegetable based rotation grown either conventionally, or organically using two different set of strategies (manure import v.s. cover crops and green manure).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Thorup-Kristensen, Kristian (2009) Model analysis of environmental relations in a vegetable rotation experiment. In: Final report from the QLIF project. , chapter Model analysis of environmental relations in a vegetable rotation experiment. [Submitted]
